body: I can practically hear the "NANDATO" at the end there. Anyway still zero sympathy for the wife character, yeah I get that having a miscarriage and becoming infertile is a brutal and harsh thing for a woman to endure, that's not the point. She is a bad wife, a bad person and a bad fuck. wife character really chafed my goat

Nvm, I was hella wrong, that guy in the chapter 5 in the comments said how this was gonna end and it has a shit ending, like, had massive potential and just shit the bed and came out all retarded. That's how I took it but if you wanna know how the story ends and have a reason to not waste your time on reading this, then that is where to go. I'm pretty disappointed to have read that when this is such a well thought stiry but just turns to actual garbage near the end, as if to speed up the plot cause something had to of happen.
i swear to got if his wife ends up cheating. i have a feeling the gangsters are gonna find the wife and think that it's the prostitute and rape/kill her.
That girl gonna pull some crazy shit i bet lol

So far liking this, but from how it looks, I really am hoping it isn't gonna be all ntr or have a while stream of badluck and end shitty. It's great so far and am intrested in reading more, even if it is gonna be ntr I'm still in until shit hits the fan and actually seems retarded if it'll be the same sorta story concept like a lot of them. Hard read real quick, the wife is gonna get mistaken some how and get raped or something
This is turning out to be an actually interesting story arc
